game.title: Assassin's Creed Unity App
game.description: This was the official companion app for Assassin's Creed: Unity, designed to enhance the main console/PC game experience. It allowed players to manage a brotherhood of assassins, send them on puzzle missions, unlock in-game items like outfits, and explore an interactive 3D map of Paris. All app-exclusive content was later integrated into the main game via patch. The app was retired from official stores years ago.

specifications.languages: English, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Español, Português

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this app will be added in the future
